name: Peanut Butter Protein Milkshake
author: thedailygourmet
summary: This milkshake has extra protein from black beans, the deep chocolate taste is from cacao (not to be confused with cocoa) powder and is dressed up with optional whipped cream, peanuts, and chocolate drizzle. I cannot promise similar results using a standard blender, such as a Ninja®.
ingredients: 2 tablespoons powdered peanut butter (such as PB2®)
¼ cup black beans, rinsed and drained
directions: Combine chocolate almond milk, peanut butter powder, and cacao powder in a high-speed blender (such as Vitamix®)
Blend on speed variable 1, slowly moving up to the top speed
Blend for 1 minute until ice is incorporated
Pour milkshake into a tall glass
